channel.title: How do i make my own website?
channel.description:
i was wondering how to make my own website free of course :P withought like www.freewebs.com/blah blah blah i want it just normal like www.moparisthebest.com
plz post if u have any ideas

item.title: How do i make my own website?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

mrrules:

Well first of all you have to type your html for the website.I would suggest just using notepad…And once your done typing the html just save all your page’s that you made to a new folder and save them as yourname.html.Then find a free domian host and upload your file’s to the hoster and you get to choose your domian name of corse.(Not going to be a .com)

Don’t try to teach him stuff if you don’t know how to code sites. Don’t use tables, bgcolor, body background, center, or any of that shit. Learn XHTML and CSS before you start creating a site. Use Dreamweaver and divs.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my own website?
item.dc:creator: @Chase Chase
item.description:
@Chase wrote:

www.webhosting.nationvoice.com - Free webhosting. That’s a start, because it also includes a .nationvoice.com domain. It has a lot of storage, and has a lot of mysql DBs and FTP accounts. You can use Fantastico on the cpanel or just upload the files yourself to get some type of forum software on your forum.

item.title: How do i make my own website?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Well first of all you have to type your html for the website.I would suggest just using notepad…And once your done typing the html just save all your page’s that you made to a new folder and save them as yourname.html.Then find a free domian host and upload your file’s to the hoster and you get to choose your domian name of corse.(Not going to be a .com)

EXAMPLE:

This is what you start with in your notepad.

[code]

[/code]

[code]

Title of page My website homepage. This text is bold [/code]

You put what you want it to say at the top of the browser between and .Then when you put stuff between and that text will show up on the page.When you use the tag that show’s the text bold.

<body bgcolor=000000>

Put that between and and it will change the background color to black.You can go here and get the color code’s to change it to diff color’s. http://www.w3schools.com/html/html_colornames.asp.Or if you want to make your background a picture you can use this.

<body background="clouds.gif">

You can use that one if you have the picture in the folder or some were it can be found.You can also use this.

body background="http://www.w3schools.com/clouds.gif">

Use that if you hosted the image and you can get the url.Use this tag to start a paragraph.

[cod]>

Type your stuff between them[/p]

To make a heading and to center it use this.(used for New’s)

<h1 align="center">This is heading</h1>

If you want to just center something like text or a banner just put this…

 <center>Text or picture here</center>

Ok…? One more thing im going to tell you how to do is make table’s.What is a table? Well it’s something you use to make a navigation bar.

[code]

row 1, cell 1 row 1, cell 2
row 2, cell 1 row 2, cell 2
[/code]

That’s use to make a table…First of all

border="1">

The border is the line’s around it the 1 stand’s for how thick or wide the border is.And 1 i think is the thinest it goes.The example i gave you has 2 table’s side by side if you only want one row take away.

[code]

row 2, cell 1 row 2, cell 2 [/code]

That’s all i can do for now hope it helps you alittle.Ill try to post how to make a login thing.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my own website?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

avistetto:

get a job buy a domain or theres some sites which u can buy domains for pts and u get points by posting or this one site had games and if u beat the highscore u got 500 points and needed 2000 for a .com domain so i hacked all of em with cheatengine has about 10k and transfered to m dummy account which i created on a diff comp =P

What?

You just have to buy a domain name, then get someone to host your server.
